events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund for my order as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund-related request due to incorrect item delivery.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer complaint.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I understand you want a refund for the wrong item delivered.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached the photo showing the incorrect item I received.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund immediately and send you confirmation once completed.
I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the refund. Thanks for your help!
The refund process has been completed successfully and the amount should reflect in your account soon.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Since your refund was confirmed received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now.
